publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1814.2 Liam McArthur: The Impact of the UK Budget on Scotlandâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-1814) in the name of John Swinney, after "10p tax rate", insert "deplores the continued failure of the UK Government to provide an adequate package of measures to help families affected by the falling housing market and the absence of sufficient budget provision for the alleviation of child poverty".
